wikipedia_page.main: James Aitken Whyte (28 January 1920 – 17 June 2005) was a Scottish theologian, presbyterian minister, and academic. He served as Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland from 1988 to 1989.

response: * 28 January – James A. Whyte, priest and theologian (died 2005)
